Package model

Class WatercolorBrush

java.lang.Object
model.DrawingTool
model.Brush
model.WatercolorBrush
public class WatercolorBrush extends Brush
WatercolorBrush: Represents a watercolor brush tool for drawing. This class extends the Brush class and defines the behavior of a watercolor brush tool for drawing on a canvas. It provides methods for drawing with varying opacity, making it suitable for creating watercolor-like effects.
Version:
1.6
Author:
Doom Al Rajhi

      public void drawDragged(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas canvas, double x, double y)
      Description copied from class: DrawingTool
      Abstract method that must be implemented by subclasses. This method is responsible for handling continuous drawing as the mouse is dragged.
